MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the FK3 postcode area of Grangemouth. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 4:40PM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of onsite difficulties and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:11PM on Tuesday, 09 March 2021.
